lines.text:
[on the porn industry]
All I'm saying is... it can get to you.
No worries. Thanks for the warning, though.
You're welcome. Pops... If you dance with the devil, the devil don't change. The devil changes you.
Some of your lyrics?
That's cute.
There are some things that you see, and you can't unsee them. Know what I mean?
Who's that?
[just before being brutally pistol whipped]
No, don't!
DIE! FUCKER DIE! DIE!
[while pistol whipping Eddie and then shows his hand with blood]
You trust me to take your money, but not your picture?
Those are two different kinds of trust.
What're you reading?
[Max California shows book - "Anal Secretary"]
Catchy title. What are you really reading? Hard to believe that book's got any parts worth highlighting.
[Max California reveals real book - "In Cold Blood"]
Capote!
Yeah, well. You know how it is.
Yeah. Wouldn't want to embarrass yourself in front of your fellow perverts.
That's right. I might get drummed out of the Pornographer's Union. Where would I be then?
[after Tom Welles has asked for his "assistance"]
I don't know exactly what you're looking for, but just for the record - I'm straight.
Congratulations.

You know the best part of killing someone? The look on their face. It's that look. Not when they're threatened. Not when you hurt them. Not even when they see the knife. It's when they feel the knife go in. That's it. It's surprise. They just can't believe it's really happening to them. She had that look, the girl, when she knew it wasn't just porno.
Can I interest you in a battery-operated vagina?
No thank you.
Are you sure? I'd hate for you to be in one of those everyday situations that calls for a battery-operated vagina and not have one.
[to porn store customer]
Hey! It's like a gas station, you pay before you pump!
[On selling porn]
I don't buy it. I don't endorse it. I just point the way.
Mrs. Mathews... remember when I asked you if you'd want to know the truth about what happened to Mary Anne, no matter what that meant?
Well, yeah.
Some men took her, and they killed her and buried her in the woods.
Oh my God! Oh my God!
I want to hurt them. I want to punish them for what they did. Please give me your permission to punish them!

[on phone]
Eddie?
Yeah.
I know all about it.
Yeah, you know about what?
About that girl. Six years ago. I know what you did to her.
Who is this?
You murdered her. You and your friends.
What the fuck are you talkin' about?
You killed her on film. And now you're fucked. You're all fucked.
I can hook you up, though. You name the vice I name the price.
Yeah man, I knew her, I dumped that bitch right before I moved to L.A. She shows up knocking at my door like a fucking stocker. I told that bitch that she could go to hell.
Where did she go?
Hell, maybe. I don't know, I don't know & I don't give a fuck either. She said that she might work at a Titty bar or something like that, ask me her tits where not that great.
Did you hear from her again?

Hey man just cause I was fucking her at High School doesn't mean I wanted her out there, she came to Hollywood to be a big fucking movie star, & so do I. And check me out. You know what pass me one of those smokes?

[throws his cigarrete and steps it]
I don't smoke.
One, there's always a victim; two, don't be it.
And three?
I forgot what three is.
[Tom hands Max an envelope]
What is this?
Money. People use it to buy goods and services.
Do you think people like the Christians hire us to invite us to their dinner parties? It's our job to clean up their royal messes.
I'm gonna kill you, Eddie. I'm gonna kill you, and I'm gonna leave you here just like you left her.

You're not gonna kill me. You don't have it in you. What are you gonna do? You gonna shoot me with you own gun, huh? Registered in your name? You really fucking thought this through, didn't you, genius? You're gonna have to dig the bullets outta my head. That'll be nice, huh? Or you could dig a hole. Dig it with your own hands, and bury me in it next to your fucking girlfriend. Go ahead. Pull the fucking trigger. Well go ahead. What're you waiting for? Go ahead, do it! You faggot! What do you want me to do, start crying like a little baby? "Oh, I'm so sorry I killed the little girl." Well, fuck you, and fuck her! Go ahead! Put me outta my fucking misery! Pull the fucking trigger! Pull the fucking trigger! Do it! Do it!
[after removing his mask for the first time]
What were you expecting? A monster?
[after Daniel Longdale's appearance on the set]
Satan Ex Machina.

[dying from a gunshot wound to the neck]
This is wrong, something's wrong. Oh, God, not like this. I'm supposed to have something more cinematic. Kill them, Machine... kill them all.
[dies]
[last lines]

[voice-over]
Dear Mr. Welles - thank you for writing me and telling me your real name, who you really are, and what really happened. I'm glad those men are dead, but nothing will ever fill the hole in my heart. I will try to use the money you sent for some good, after I get some help for myself. I hated you for telling me the truth, but now I realize you and I are probably the only people that ever really cared about Mary Ann. Yours truly, Janet Mathews.
You motherfuckers, you SMALL-TIME motherfuckers, you want to know something, while you are all still small-time with a million-dollars to split around!
A million?
Yeah, that's what Christian gave Longdale, and that's what he gave you right, a million in cash? STUPID FUCKIN' TRASH!
What the hell is he talkin' is he talking about DOLLARS HERE?
No he is Lying!
Did you fucked me, hey did you fucked me on this?
Of course not Edward.
Then why is he talking about a Million-Dollars?
He is saying THAT Longdale fucked us, which is so totally, completely bizarre.
I just want this to be over nobody else needs to get hurt. Now Eddie I know you have a gun take it out.
FUCK YOU!
TAKE IT OUT NOW! DROP IT or I will shoot!
Don't be stupid Edward.

[Eddie drops the gun]
Now kick it on my direction hard.
[He kicks it]
Now Dino, drop the crossbow.
Okay, ACTION!
[drops the crossbow but kills Mr. Longdale]
Do you get turned on at places like tonight?
No, I do not.
But you don't exactly get turned off either, do ya?
Devil's changing you already.

[speaking to missing girl's mother]
Can you tell me if you had to make a choice... if you were forced to choose... between imagining her out ther somewhere living a good life... being happy... bu you don't know... you never find out... or the worst being true... her being gone... but you know... you finally know what's happened to her.
I'll never get tired of hurting you, Eddie!
Hello, Mr. Poole?
You a process server?
That's it. She's dead. She's been dead a long fucking time and nobody gives a shit but you.
[holding a picture of Welles' wife and daughter]
What I could do with faces like these on film. On second thought, why would I need their faces?
If there was no honor among perverts and pornographers, the whole fucking business would fall apart.
There's no mystery. Things I do, I do them because I like them! Because I want to!
If someone never saw or sold a snuff film, they shouldn't give a damn what I ask about it, if they have they got a right to be nervous.
[spoken voice whilst Tom Welles is reading a poem]
Starlight; star bright, first star I've seen tonight, I wish I may; I wish I might, Have this wish I wish tonight
Are you a police officer or in any way affiliated with law enforcement?
Fuck you Larry.
Are you a police officer or in any way affiliated with law enforcement?
Fuck you Larry.
Mmm, you're getting the moves.
Hello, Machine. Love your work.
[first lines]
Welcome to Miami. While in the airport, please observe Florida and local laws which prohibit any smoking in the terminal. Thank you for not smoking.

[on Eddie]
STOP EDDIE! I swear to Christ that I'll shoot you in the back!

[on Machine]
Take off the mask.
[Machine shakes his head saying no]
TAKE OFF THE FUCKIN' MASK!
HE'S ONLY GOT ONE BULLET!
[Tom kicks Machine]

[on the phone]
Hello.
It's me!
Uh-huh, What do you want?
Look I've just got a phone call, we got to talk, & now we can't talk on the phone. And so one of should get on a plane or something all right.
Oh blow me you paranoid fuck.
[hangs up the phone]
FUCK! FUCK!

[takes off the headphones]
So you like to watch paranoid fuck.

[comes hitting Eddie while accommodating pictures & movies]
Put your hands on your head & get down in your knees!
[Tom kicks him]
DON'T THINK I'M FUCKIN' AROUND!
[kicks him 3 times]
It hurts doesn't it!
What the fuck do you want?
Who's Machine, Where does he live?
I don't know.
I want his name?
I don't know his fuckin' name!

[kicks him another time and puts his left feet on Eddie's hand almost through his mouth]
I'll never get tired of hurting you Eddie.
I don't know his fuckin' name, he shows up in his mask & he leaves in his mask, he's Dino's fuckin' boy. I don't know he's from New York or somewhere, I don't fuckin' know!

[takes his feet off of Eddie's mouth]
Get in the car!
Why?
You're gonna show me where you killed her.
Fuck You!
[Tom kicks him another time]
All right, you fuck!

[on the phone to Mrs Christian]
The film is real.
[she looks devastated]
Mrs Christian recently chose to end her own life.
[On seeing a bogus snuff film]
The Resurrection!" Well, what'd you expect for twelve hundred?
[On Dino Velvet]
He's a producer-slash-director-slash weirdo. He's like the Jim Jarmusch of S & M.
So you got a wife and a daughter and a nice little yellow house and a dog named 'Shep'. What the hell are you doing here?
Why would Christian want this? Why would he want a film of a... a little girl being butchered?
Because he *could*!
Eddie Poole?
Are you a Process Server?
No, no I've been inquiring around if by any chance you've seen this girl come through here
[comes showing a picture of Mary Ann Mathews]
You a cop?
I'm a member of her family.
You got any idea of how much pussy comes through here?
Please if you just take a look, it would've been a few years.
[Eddie's face sweating by looking the picture of Mary Ann Mathews]
Her name is Mary Ann Mathews.
Never seened her.
You're sure?
Yeah I'm sure, I've just looked at the fuckin' picture didn't I? And come on, I've got a lot of shit to do!

[letter to Tom]
And I'm glad those men are dead.

[watching a video of Machine torturing a woman]
Oh, he's a lover, man... definitely loves what he does for a living.
Hey! It's like a gas station! You pay before you pump!
Who makes these films?
I don't know. Probably the Philippines.
[after watching some more of the girl being tortured]
Yep. Definitely the Philippines.
